Description: The by-product of consuming Uranium Fuel Rods in a Nuclear Power Plant. Non-Fissile Uranium can be extracted. Handle with caution. Caution: HIGHLY Radioactive.
The by-product of consuming Plutonium Fuel Rods in a Nuclear Power Plant. Must be stored in a safe location. Handle with caution. Caution: EXTREMELY Radioactive.
Used for building. Good for stable Foundations.
Derived from Raw Quartz. Commonly used to create glass structures, in advanced refinement processes, and for alternative production of electronics.
Used for crafting. One of the most basic parts.
Primarily used when constructing slightly more advanced buildings.
Smelted from Aluminum Scrap, which is refined from Alumina Solution. Used to produce specialized aluminum-based parts.
Primarily used as fuel for Drones and vehicles.
Fuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for vehicles and the Jetpack.
Ionized Fuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for vehicles and the Jetpack.
Rocket Fuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for vehicles and the Jetpack.
Turbofuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for vehicles and the Jetpack.
Absorbs radioactive particles when used with the Hazmat Suit.
Used for crafting. One of the most basic parts.
Used for crafting. One of the most basic parts.
Used for crafting. Primarily used to build Power Lines.
Used for crafting the most basic parts.
Used for crafting. A sturdier and more durable Iron Plate.
Used for crafting. The moving parts of a motor.
A much more efficient alternative to Coal. Used as fuel for vehicles and Coal-Powered Generators.
Can be used as-is to generate power, or packaged to be used as fuel for vehicles or the Jetpack.
A high-impulse compressed gas fuel. Can be used as-is to power Fuel-Powered Generators, or packaged to be used as fuel for vehicles or the Jetpack.
Used for crafting. Primarily used for Pipelines due to its high corrosion resistance.
Used for crafting. A multipurpose building block.
Used for crafting. One of the most basic parts.
Produced when Nitrogen Gas reacts with Water. Its high corrosiveness and oxidizing properties make it an excellent choice for refinement and fuel production processes.
A more efficient alternative to Fuel. Can be used as-is to generate power, or packaged to be used as fuel for vehicles.
Used to package gases and volatile liquids for transportation.
An electronic oscillator circuit that uses the mechanical resonance of a vibrating crystal to create an electrical signal with a precise frequency.
Creates a mechanical force that is used to move things from machines to vehicles.

Concentrated Dark Matter Residue that is isolated within a crystalline vessel. This form of containment allows for utilising Dark Matter reliably in other production processes. Power Usage: 500-1500 MW (1000 MW average).
Fuel that has been ionized, allowing it to deliver incredible output. Can be used as-is to power Fuel-Powered Generators, or packaged to be used as fuel for vehicles or the Jetpack.
The next-gen version of a Computer.
Keeps advanced parts and buildings from exceeding efficient temperature levels.
The Ficsite Trigon, made from Ficsite Ingots, is perfectly shaped for all construction challenges. It's performance is so exceptional, it basically solved structural engineering.
A more complex and powerful version of the regular Motor.

Time Crystals are Diamonds that have been reconfigured on a sub-atomic level in the Converter to retain a time-periodic self-organizing structure. This allows them to be used in the development of quantum processing and storage technologies.

Produced as a by-product of Quantum Encoding processes and alternatively generated in the Converter. Various fields of science are still debating the nature and properties of Dark Matter. Meanwhile, FICSIT has found several applications for it in space-time manipulation.

The active and contained form of the Strange Alien Matter. Proper electromagnetic containment is required, as it appears to be able to manipulate the atomic bonds of any matter it comes into contact with.

Excited Photonic Matter is essential for all production processes in the Quantum Encoder. Formed in the Converter by inducing intense photon interactions through exposure to SAM in a high-energy environment.
Synthetic Diamonds produced by exposing Coal to extreme heat and pressure. Used in the production of Time Crystals and Dark Matter Crystals. Power Usage: 250-750 MW (500 MW average).
Used to make products that require high heat conduction or a high specific strength. Thin, lightweight, and highly durable.

An oscillator circuit that uses the mechanical resonance of a vibrating crystal to create a string vibration with a precise frequency. Often used in teleportation technology and dimensional manipulation.

The Neural-Quantum Processor utilizes a combination of neural network architecture and quantum computing techniques to achieve unprecedented performance. This technology has enabled some of FICSIT's biggest advancements in artificial intelligence and relativistic engineering.
Project Part #12. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly. Power Usage: 0-2000 MW (1000 MW average). Growth is the metric by which we measure success.

Project Part #7. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly. These modular generators use superconducting magnets and vast amounts of electricity to produce a powerful and easily expandable magnetic field.

The SAM Fluctuator is able to regulate and direct the behaviour of Reanimated SAM through the application of electric charges with varying frequencies. This control facilitates technologies such as matter-to-energy conversion and spatiotemporal matter manipulation.
Primarily used when constructing slightly more advanced buildings.
A corrosion-resistant, nitride-hardened, highly-robust-yet-lightweight modular frame.
Enhances and directs radio signals.
Produced by reconstructing other metals on a molecular level using Strange Alien Matter. Synthesized by FICSIT to be the perfect construction material, and used in the most high-end processes.

Project Part #10. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly. Years ahead of the competition, this top-of-the-line 3D printer is used for the production of synthetic biological resources.

Project Part #6. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly. This extremely fast and precise computing system is specifically designed to direct the Project Assembly: Assembly Phase.
Smelted from Caterium Ore. Primarily used for advanced electronics.
Used to package fluids for transportation.
Advanced electronics that have a plethora of different uses.
Versatile and easy to manufacture, this material has a wide range of uses.
Simultaneously utilizes the compressive strength of concrete and the tensile strength of steel. Mostly used as a stable base for constructing buildings.
A very flexible material that has a lot of friction.
A by-product of Crude Oil refinement into Fuel. Commonly used to manufacture Plastic and Rubber.
A by-product of Plastic and Rubber production. Can be further refined into Fuel and Petroleum Coke.
Used for crafting. A carbon-rich material distilled from Heavy Oil Residue. Used as a less efficient Coal replacement.
Derived from Raw Quartz. Used in the production of advanced radar technology and high-quality display screens.
Smelted from a combination of Iron Ore and Coal. Can be made into several parts used in building construction.
Project Part #2. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.
Crude Oil, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for vehicles.
Heavy Oil Residue, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for vehicles.
Water, packaged for alternative transport.
Used for crafting the most basic parts.
Refined from Alumina. Can be smelted into Aluminum Ingots for industrial usage.
A versatile container cast from Aluminum Ingots.
Dissolved Alumina, extracted from Bauxite. Can be further refined into Aluminum Scrap for Aluminum Ingot production.
A complex logic machine that is used to control advanced behavior in other machines.
A more robust multipurpose frame.
Project Part #1. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.
Connects multiple cables and wires in a very efficient way. Uses a standard pattern, so it has many varied applications.
Project Part #3. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.
Used for crafting. The static parts of a motor.
Controls AIs and keeps them from evolving in malicious ways. Super advanced electronics.
Caterium's high conductivity and resistance to corrosion make it ideal for small, advanced electronics.
Project Part #4. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.
Project Part #5. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.
Converts outgoing force into internal pressure. Required to contain unstable, high-energy matter.
Plutonium Pellets encased in concrete. Used to produce Plutonium Fuel Rods for Nuclear Power production. Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

Produced in the Particle Accelerator through conversion of Non-fissile Uranium. Used to produce Encased Plutonium Cells for Plutonium Fuel Rods. Power Usage: 250-750 MW (500 MW average). Caution: Moderately Radioactive.
The Uranium-238 isotope is non-fissile, meaning it cannot be used for nuclear fission. It can, however, be converted into fissile Plutonium in the Particle Accelerator. Caution: Mildly Radioactive.
Produced by combining Sulfur and Water in a complex reaction. Primarily used in refinement processes and Battery production.
Ground-up Copper Ingots. The high natural density of Copper, combined with the granularity of the powder, makes this part perfect for producing Nuclear Pasta in the Particle Accelerator.
Used to dissipate heat faster.
Regulates power output via electromagnetism.

Project Part #9. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly. Power Usage: 500-1500 MW (1000 MW average). Nuclear Pasta is extremely dense degenerate matter, formed when extreme pressure forces protons and electrons together into neutrons. It is theorized to exist naturally within the crust of neutron stars.
Used to produce Uranium Fuel Rods for Nuclear Power production. Made from Uranium Ore. Caution: Mildly Radioactive.
Silica dissolved in Water, produced as part of the alternative refinement of Raw Quartz. The Silica can be extracted from the Water to complete the refinement process.
Project Part #8. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly. Uses extreme heat to produce the high-pressure plasma required to get Project Assembly into motion.
An explosive powder that is commonly used to produce simple explosives.
Usage and production of this material is strictly prohibited. On Earth, that is. There are no rules in space, only efficiency. Power Usage: 500-1500 MW (1000 MW average).
Used to break down space and time. Required to power Portals.

Project Part #11. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly. A large amount of force is required for the Warp Drives to activate, so sticking them to rockets was the logical next step. Additionally, results improved immensely when the observers were further removed from the Warp Drives upon activation.
Filters out toxins and pollutants from the air when used with a Gas Mask.
Ground-up Alien Remains in a neat little package. Used for medical purposes and to research alien organisms.
A strange slug radiating an unknown weak power.

Translates organic chemicals into readable alien genetic information. Used for researching alien organisms. Go the extra kilometer! Knowledge is power, and power is just efficiency with fewer steps. Depositing Alien DNA Capsules in the AWESOME Sink provides FICSIT with knowledge, and pioneers with Coupons.
A weird alien phenomenon. While the sphere appears liquid, it behaves like a solid and does not have any detectable mass. It seems to somehow interact with and have awareness of its environment.
A strange slug radiating a powerful unknown power.
A strange slug radiating an unknown power.
An explosive powder that is commonly used to produce modern firearms.

A symbol of appreciation for all the hard work FICSIT has done for its employees. It seems to have an aura of gratitude. Seeing this also means the seasonal event is nearly done, and we can finally get back to Saving The Day.
A collection of FICSMAS ornaments and also an eyesore.
This FICSMAS Tree Branch is very different from regular tree branches: it's used to produce parts and buildings during the FICSMAS event, rather than for combustion.
FICSIT's newest holiday innovation: decorations that can be turned into decorations! Efficiency and waste-conscious design at its best.
A delicious Candy Cane to be enjoyed during the FICSMAS Holidays. *Disclaimer: Not for human consumption…
This Actual Snow is made from several chemical elements and experiences 100% like naturally occuring snow after extensive user testing.
A fancy bow. Not for wearing, eating, admiring, Lizard Doggos, humans, aliens, or anything not related to FICSMAS factory production.

Gifts that have inexplicably fallen from the sky or spawned from a FICSMAS Gift Tree. Don’t question it—they’re used to produce FICSMAS buildings and parts. These Gifts are part of the FICSMAS Event, like the calendar in the HUB.
An ornament for making FICSMAS Decorations. An acceptable red.
An ornament for making FICSMAS Decorations. A mildly pleasing blue.
An ornament for making FICSMAS Decorations. A slightly dignified copper.
An ornament for making FICSMAS Decorations. An okay iron.
Used as fuel for Nuclear Power Plants. Caution: Produces radioactive Uranium Waste when consumed. Caution: Moderately Radioactive.
Used as fuel for Nuclear Power Plants. Caution: Produces radioactive Plutonium Waste when consumed. Caution: HIGHLY Radioactive.
Used as fuel for Nuclear Power Plants. The power source that put FICSIT on the map. Literally. The crater is still there. Caution: Moderately Radioactive.
Primarily used as fuel. Biomass Burners and vehicles can use Leaves for power.
Primarily used as fuel. Biomass Burners and vehicles can use Wood for power.
Primarily used as fuel. Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power. Biomass is much more energy-efficient than raw biological matter.
The most energy-efficient form of solid Biomass. Can be used as fuel for the Chainsaw.
Liquid Biofuel can be used as-is to generate power, or packaged to be used as fuel for vehicles.
Liquid Biofuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for vehicles and the Jetpack.
Alumina Solution, packaged for alternative transport.
Nitrogen Gas, packaged for alternative transport.
Nitric Acid, packaged for alternative transport.
Sulfuric Acid, packaged for alternative transport.
Used to craft equipment. Flexible but durable fabric.
Used for crafting. Biomass Burners and vehicles can also use Mycelia for power.
The carapace of an alien Hog creature. Used for MAM research.
The remains of a plasma-spitting alien creature. Used for MAM research.
The remains of whatever that creepy thing was. Used for MAM research.
The shell-like remains of an alien... thing. Used for MAM research.

This intricate condensed-matter matrix is used to enhance the output of the Alien Power Augmenter. Initially developed in efforts to create a human-made Somersloop, the Alien Power Matrix cannot sustain the extra-dimensional energy connection on its own. However, it can effectively stabilize the energy stream of the Somersloop.
